name: Xsyon: Apocalypse
blurb: The ultimate sandbox MMORPG. Shape the land, build cities, develop societies, create a New World!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Xsyon Bumper Sticker - Forget Obama and Romney. Vote Xsyon! Xsyon game account holders will receive the in game title Settler when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched.
Xsyon Magnet - Liven up your fridge or stick it on your favorite battle axe. Xsyon game account holders will receive the in game title Settler when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched.
Xsyon commemorative embroidered patch. Great for packs, caps and suit pockets.\r\nXsyon game account holders will receive the in game title Settler when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched.

Xsyon Goodies Pack - The above 3 goodies all in one package. Catch 'em all! Xsyon game account holders will receive the in game title Settler and an in game Settler's Hat when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched.

Xsyon T-Shirt - Impress your friends with the latest in Xsyon fashion. Xsyon game account holders will receive the in game title Settler and an in game Settler's Hat when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched. Rewards at or below this level do not include access to the game.

CITIZEN - Xsyon Game Account. Includes 2 months gameplay in the current Prelude phase and 3 additonal months of gameplay in Xsyon Apocalypse. Includes the in game title Citizen and an in game Citizen's Helm when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched. The Game Account can be exchanged for 3 months gameplay for current Prelude holders. (Applies to all Xsyon Game Account awards).

CITIZEN PLUS - Xsyon Game Account as in the Citizen level PLUS all 3 Xsyon Goodies (bumper sticker, magnet and patch). Includes the in game title Citizen and an in game Citizen's Helm when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched.

COLLECTOR - A Limited Collector's Boxed Edition of Xsyon. Xsyon Game Account as in the Citizen level PLUS a Xsyon Soundtrack CD, all 3 Xsyon Goodies, and a printed map of the Xsyon world. Includes the in game title Citizen and an in game Citizen's Helm when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched.

MEGA - The Mega Limited Collector's Boxed Edition of Xsyon. The Collector's set PLUS the Xsyon T-Shirt  and inner case signed by Xsyon's creator Jordi Grau Davis. Includes the in game title Citizen and an in game Citizen's Helm and Chest Piece when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched.

MEGA PLUS - Includes the MEGA level Collector's Edition PLUS one year subscription to Xsyon. You can apply your one year now during the Prelude or wait until Xsyon Apocalypse is in full phase. Includes the in game title Citizen and an in game Citizen's Helm, Chest Piece AND Weapon when Xsyon Apocalypse is launched.

PIONEER - Includes the MEGA level Collector's Edition PLUS a LIFETIME subscription to Xsyon and a custom mini avatar of your character for use on the Xsyon forums and game. (Avatar will be delivered by May 2013). Includes all in game rewards and the title Pioneer.

PATRON I - Includes the PIONEER level (lifetime subscription) PLUS a digital and printed Portrait of your Xsyon character drawn by one of our artists. Portraits will be displayed on our website's Hall of Fame. (Portrait will be delivered by July 2013). Includes all in game rewards and the title Patron.

PATRON II - Includes the PIONEER level (lifetime subscription) PLUS a digital and printed Scene with your Xsyon character drawn by one of our artists. Scenes will also be displayed on the Xsyon website. (Scene will be delivered by July 2013). Includes all in game rewards and the title Patron.

FOUNDER - Weapon Design. Work with our artists to design and name an in game craftable weapon. Your character will receive a special master edition of this weapon in game. Includes the PIONEER level rewards plus your choice of Character Portrait or Scene. Includes all in game rewards and the title Founder.

FOUNDER - Creature Design. Work with our artists to design and name an in game Mutant Creature. Includes the PIONEER level rewards plus your choice of Character Portrait or Scene. Includes all in game rewards and the title Founder.

FOUNDER - Armor Design. Work with our artists to design and name an in game craftable armor set. Your character will receive a special master edition of this armor set in game. Includes the PIONEER level rewards plus your choice of Character Portrait or Scene. Includes all in game rewards and the title Founder.

FOUNDER - Building Design. Work with our artists to design and name an in game craftable building. Includes the PIONEER level rewards plus your choice of Character Portrait or Scene. Includes all in game rewards and the title Founder.

FOUNDER - Building Set Design. Work with our artists to design and name an in game craftable set of building parts. Includes a wall, floor, roof, post and ramp set. Includes the PIONEER level rewards plus your choice of Character Portrait or Scene. Includes all in game rewards and the title Founder.

LEGEND - Meet the creator of Xsyon at the private Apocalypse Launch Party at Lake Tahoe, Nevada where Xsyon takes place. Spend two days meeting with the creator, discuss game design and help us celebrate. Includes your choice of FOUNDER reward with all associated rewards. In addition, you will have a totem monument dedicated to your character on Founder's Isle in game! (2 nights of hotel in Tahoe included. You must provide your own transportation to Lake Tahoe.)
